results.title: Happy Birthday
results.content:
As you begin to file away, the year that could fill a sea of essays, may you not focus on things gone astray, but smile remembering all of the fun horseplay.

For the time may be nigh to come away, with new perspective garnered from the fray.  So let us not attempt to delay, the glorious drive down life's freeway.

Instead embrace the interplay, that embellishes life day-to-day. For this year will be filled with adventures non-cliche, whether it be Bombay, Taipei, or Far Rockaway.

For it is your day, a day for soiree, a day to take a sleigh down a mountain of clay. And when you finish your get away, know the adventures continue in old New York Bay.

Happy Birthday, Hillie!

meta.description: In case you need context: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Birthday
meta.author: Dan Corman
